functionDecorators.name: _claimStakeCommission
functionDecorators.description: Function used to claim the commission earned by the staker.

functionDecorators.name: upgrade
functionDecorators.description: Transfers all tokens held by contract to a new contract in case of upgrade.

functionDecorators.name: getAllPendingRewardOfUser
functionDecorators.description: Function used to get pending rewards of a particular user address.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardAndClaimedStatus
functionDecorators.description: Gets reward amount and claiming status for a given claim id.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardToBeDistributedByUser
functionDecorators.description: Total reward in token due for claim by a user.

functionDecorators.name: claimAllPendingReward
functionDecorators.description: Function used to claim all pending rewards : Claims Assessment + Risk Assessment + Governance Claim assesment, Risk assesment, Governance rewards.

functionDecorators.name: changeClaimStatus
functionDecorators.description: Decides the next course of action for a given claim.

functionDecorators.name: getRewardToBeGiven
functionDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be rewarded to a user for a particular vote id.

parameterDecorators.name: voteid
parameterDecorators.description: vote id for which reward has to be Calculated.

parameterDecorators.name: flag
parameterDecorators.description: if 1 calculate even if claimed,else don't calculate if already claimed.
